data.name: F.I.S.T.: Forged In Shadow Torch - Original Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
F.I.S.T.: Forged In Shadow Torch Original Soundtrack is composed by Caisheng Bo. It combines a variety of instruments and synthesizers to build a magnificent dieselpunk world. The mixing timbre of inorganic and organic presents the complex emotions from the ruthlessness of the mechanical steel to the rage of Rayton’s fight.
This product contains original soundtracks from the game F.I.S.T.: Forged In Shadow Torch.
Attached with staves of When The Night Falls Upon.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 800 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 2 GB available space
